dsOverview.title: FSL/PROFS Experimental Mesonet, along the front range of Colorado , May1985-Jun1994

summary.p: The Forecast Systems Laboratory (FSL) (formerly PROFS) had operated a 22-station experimental surface mesoscale meteorological network (Mesonet) along the front range of Colorado from May 1985 to Jun 1994.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/OAR/FSL > Forecast Systems Laboratory, OAR, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
